start: your messege will be told to my master.
message_received_receipt: your messege have been told to my master.
reply_to_no_message: please send a messege to me.
reply_message_sent:
the messege have been replied.
receiver：%s ([link](tg://user?id=%s))
blocked_alert: cannot reply due to the user stop the bot.
reply_message_failed: please retry due to the failed action.
warning_start_conversation: to start conversation, you need to run /say directive first.
warning_admin_only: this directive is only available for my master.
warning_end_conversation: to run other bot functions, you need to run /done to end conversation first.
notify_conversation_start: you can talk to me now.
